channel.title: Vertex Ai on danicat.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Vertex Ai on danicat.dev

item.title: Boldly Prompting: A Practical Guide to System Instructions and Agent Tools
item.author: daniela@danicat.dev (Daniela Petruzalek)
item.description: This article explores the concepts of system instruction, session history and agent tools to create a smarter diagnostic assistant.

item.title: Digging deeper into the Vertex AI SDK for Python
item.author: daniela@danicat.dev (Daniela Petruzalek)
item.description: This article explores the communication model between the client code and the Gemini API using the Vertex AI SDK for Python

item.title: How I turned my computer into "USS Enterprise" using AI Agents
item.author: daniela@danicat.dev (Daniela Petruzalek)
item.description: How to create a diagnostic agent that speaks natural language using Gemini and Vertex AI Agent Engine
